pullrequest.title: Fix example usage of ${prefix} in gazebo_ros export tag.

content.raw:
> under a normal installation, the correct path is added to the search path through some other means

I believe it's appended to `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` when sourcing `setup.sh`.

> I’m actually not sure where gazebo_media_path is supposed to point

It's a bit confusing because what `gazebo_ros_pkgs` calls `gazebo_media_path`, Gazebo calls `GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH`. There's some documentation [here](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=components&cat=get_started#EnvironmentVariables). It really depends on the package, you may want it to point to `/models`, `/worlds`, `/media` or other custom paths.
content.html:
under a normal installation, the correct path is added to the search path through some other means

I believe it's appended to LD_LIBRARY_PATH when sourcing setup.sh.

I’m actually not sure where gazebo_media_path is supposed to point

It's a bit confusing because what gazebo_ros_pkgs calls gazebo_media_path, Gazebo calls GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH. There's some documentation here. It really depends on the package, you may want it to point to /models, /worlds, /media or other custom paths.
